entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegEx support for ranges outside of Basic Multilingual Plane #79865
  • Access Violation in Interop+Sys.ChDir #79864
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById() doesn't always return correct UTC time offset #79860
  • [6.0][7.0] MacCatalyst Mono - XcodeBuildApp failed moving directory #79859
  • [6.0] .NET 4.8 queue removed #79858
  • Cannot precompile blazor wasm with RunAOTCompilation set to true inside docker #79857
  • [macOS] cannot debug / stop at breakpoints when app sandbox is enabled #79852
  • IHost.RunAsync() does not exit on CTRL_+C #79851
  • Non-default property setter in class bound with appsettings.json, no longer loading in .NET 7 #79848
  • GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_Arm/project.assets.json already exists #79843
  • Provide a source generator for Stream that emits the boilerplate for most members and enforces using the most-efficient members #79839
    8.0.0
  • MVC Scaffolding and XmlTransforms -- Web.config #79838

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Provide optimized read-only collections for SortedSet and SortedDictionary #79781
  • [mono][interpreter] Fix performance of new span helpers #76326
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Publicly expose `IPartition<TElement>` #79791
  • [API Proposal]: `MemoryStream.GetString(Encoding? encoding)` #79830
  • Test failure: JIT\IL_Conformance\Old\Conformance_Base\ldarg_i\ldarg_i.cmd #79829
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/ldarg_i/ldarg_i.sh #79840
  • [wasm][icu] Locale aliases are not resolved correcly #79815
    8.0.0
  • ConsoleManualTests.ReadKey_KeyChords failures #78467
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79866
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0] Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79862
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid a race condition in restoring the GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_* projects #79861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][threads] save/restore errno in thread state transitions #79856
    area-Threading-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79855
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fixes InvalidCastException when using other attributes #79854
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • createdump: only dump committed memory #79853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add NativeAOT checked leg #79847
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix size regression from enum sorting #79845
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Checked/Release asm diffs #79844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid delegate allocation in generic cycle detector #79842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79669
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][debugger] Fix Debugger.Break() behavior when running on release mode #79822
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79849
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Added a null-check for 2-dim array access #79450
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update manual console tests after recent ReadKey rewrite #79811
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Fix ldarg_i test #79834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove bash dependency from init-compiler #77304
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Switch to the new ARM64 Helix queues #77764
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add sourcegen support for required & init-only properties. #79828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Mono SpanHelpers workaround #79821
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix build for DUMP_GC_TABLES defined in Release #79835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix compression #79549
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix compression #79547
    area-System.Net, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79665
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
